00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 
00034 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00035 #include "BLI_string_utf8.h"
00036 
00037 #include "BLI_string_cursor_utf8.h" /* own include */
00038 
00039 typedef enum strCursorDelimType {
00040     STRCUR_DELIM_NONE,
00041     STRCUR_DELIM_ALPHA,
00042     STRCUR_DELIM_PUNCT,
00043     STRCUR_DELIM_BRACE,
00044     STRCUR_DELIM_OPERATOR,
00045     STRCUR_DELIM_QUOTE,
00046     STRCUR_DELIM_WHITESPACE,
00047     STRCUR_DELIM_OTHER
00048 } strCursorDelimType;
00049 
00050 /* return 1 if char ch is special character, otherwise return 0 */
00051 static strCursorDelimType test_special_char(const char *ch_utf8)
00052 {
00053     /* for full unicode support we really need to have large lookup tables to figure
00054      * out whats what in every possible char set - and python, glib both have these. */
00055     unsigned int uch = BLI_str_utf8_as_unicode(ch_utf8);
00056 
00057     if ((uch >= 'a' && uch <= 'z') ||
00058         (uch >= 'A' && uch <= 'Z') ||
00059         (uch == '_') /* not quite correct but allow for python, could become configurable */
00060         )
00061     {
00062         return STRCUR_DELIM_ALPHA;
00063     }
00064 
00065     switch (uch) {
00066         case ',':
00067         case '.':
00068             return STRCUR_DELIM_PUNCT;
00069 
00070         case '{':
00071         case '}':
00072         case '[':
00073         case ']':
00074         case '(':
00075         case ')':
00076             return STRCUR_DELIM_BRACE;
00077 
00078         case '+':
00079         case '-':
00080         case '=':
00081         case '~':
00082         case '%':
00083         case '/':
00084         case '<':
00085         case '>':
00086         case '^':
00087         case '*':
00088         case '&':
00089             return STRCUR_DELIM_OPERATOR;
00090 
00091         case '\'':
00092         case '\"': // " - an extra closing one for Aligorith's text editor
00093             return STRCUR_DELIM_QUOTE;
00094 
00095         case ' ':
00096             return STRCUR_DELIM_WHITESPACE;
00097 
00098         case '\\':
00099         case '!':
00100         case '@':
00101         case '#':
00102         case '$':
00103         case ':':
00104         case ';':
00105         case '?':
00106             /* case '_': *//* special case, for python */
00107             return STRCUR_DELIM_OTHER;
00108 
00109         default:
00110             break;
00111     }
00112     return STRCUR_DELIM_NONE;
00113 }
00114 
00115 int BLI_str_cursor_step_next_utf8(const char *str, size_t maxlen, int *pos)
00116 {
00117     const char *str_end = str + (maxlen + 1);
00118     const char *str_pos = str + (*pos);
00119     const char *str_next = BLI_str_find_next_char_utf8(str_pos, str_end);
00120     if (str_next) {
00121         (*pos) += (str_next - str_pos);
00122         if ((*pos) > maxlen) {
00123             (*pos) = maxlen;
00124         }
00125         return TRUE;
00126     }
00127 
00128     return FALSE;
00129 }
00130 
00131 int BLI_str_cursor_step_prev_utf8(const char *str, size_t UNUSED(maxlen), int *pos)
00132 {
00133     if ((*pos) > 0) {
00134         const char *str_pos = str + (*pos);
00135         const char *str_prev = BLI_str_find_prev_char_utf8(str, str_pos);
00136         if (str_prev) {
00137             (*pos) -= (str_pos - str_prev);
00138             return TRUE;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     return FALSE;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void BLI_str_cursor_step_utf8(const char *str, size_t maxlen,
00146                               int *pos, strCursorJumpDirection direction,
00147                               strCursorJumpType jump)
00148 {
00149     const short pos_prev = *pos;
00150 
00151     if (direction == STRCUR_DIR_NEXT) {
00152         BLI_str_cursor_step_next_utf8(str, maxlen, pos);
00153 
00154         if (jump != STRCUR_JUMP_NONE) {
00155             const strCursorDelimType is_special = (*pos) < maxlen ? test_special_char(&str[*pos]) : STRCUR_DELIM_NONE;
00156             /* jump between special characters (/,\,_,-, etc.),
00157              * look at function test_special_char() for complete
00158              * list of special character, ctr -> */
00159             while ((*pos) < maxlen) {
00160                 if (BLI_str_cursor_step_next_utf8(str, maxlen, pos)) {
00161                     if ((jump != STRCUR_JUMP_ALL) && (is_special != test_special_char(&str[*pos])))
00162                         break;
00163                 }
00164                 else {
00165                     break; /* unlikely but just in case */
00166                 }
00167             }
00168         }
00169     }
00170     else if (direction == STRCUR_DIR_PREV) {
00171         BLI_str_cursor_step_prev_utf8(str, maxlen, pos);
00172 
00173         if (jump != STRCUR_JUMP_NONE) {
00174             const strCursorDelimType is_special = (*pos) > 1 ? test_special_char(&str[(*pos) - 1]) : STRCUR_DELIM_NONE;
00175             /* jump between special characters (/,\,_,-, etc.),
00176              * look at function test_special_char() for complete
00177              * list of special character, ctr -> */
00178             while ((*pos) > 0) {
00179                 if (BLI_str_cursor_step_prev_utf8(str, maxlen, pos)) {
00180                     if ((jump != STRCUR_JUMP_ALL) && (is_special != test_special_char(&str[*pos])))
00181                         break;
00182                 }
00183                 else {
00184                     break;
00185                 }
00186             }
00187 
00188             /* left only: compensate for index/change in direction */
00189             if (((*pos) != 0) && ABS(pos_prev - (*pos)) >= 1) {
00190                 BLI_str_cursor_step_next_utf8(str, maxlen, pos);
00191             }
00192         }
00193     }
00194     else {
00195         BLI_assert(0);
00196     }
00197 }
